Name: "Hear Me — Let Us Raise the Chalice of Love!"
Title: Furina: Hear Me — Let Us Raise the Chalice of Love!
Source: Reward for inviting Furina to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

Talent.Name: "Hear Me — Let Us Raise the Chalice of Love!"
Talent.Desc:
$[K1]: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1211]</color>, equip this card.
After $[A1211] equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S12112]</color> once.
When $[A1211], who has this card equipped, uses <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[S12123]</color>, she will apply <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K1030]</color> to herself. (Normal Attack will trigger different effects depending on state)
(You must have $[A1211] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

K1.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>
K1.Desc: After you finish 1 Combat Action, it will be your opponent's turn.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Playing a card from your Hand with this rule is also a Combat Action rather than a Fast Action</color>.

Child.A1211: "Hear Me — Let Us Raise the Chalice of Love!"

K1030.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Center of Attention</color>
K1030.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When the character uses a Normal Attack:</color> {SPRITE_PRESET#2100}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Physical DMG</color> dealt by the character is converted to {SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro DMG</color>. If the character is in the {SPRITE_PRESET#3504}Ousia state, heal all of your characters on standby for 1 HP. If the character is in the {SPRITE_PRESET#3505}Pneuma state, deal +2 DMG for this instance, but deal 1 Piercing DMG to your character who has taken the least DMG.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s): 1</color>
